title: Native pixel voicemail while on Sprint?
content:
I can't get the native visual voicemail options to show on my brand new pixel 3 on Sprint. 

I've seen screenshots of voicemail being an option in the native phone app on the pixel, but those options don't show up for me in the app settings. The help section gives instructions, but the visual voicemail settings on my phone do not show up at all. 

The Sprint option for visual voicemail never works and Google voice stopped working for me two years ago.

Screenshots show the options that show up in voicemail

Any tips are welcome! 

Thank you.
